price: 75. Alle wuxuu ka dhex doortaa Rusul malaa’igta iyo dadkaba. Hubaal, Alle waa wax kasta Maqle, wax kasta Arka.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصۡطَفِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaṣṭafī mina al-malāikati rusulan wamina al-nāsi inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
